name: Rubriked
description:
What is Rubriked?

A fast paced multiplayer precision platformer! Who can clear the course quickest in Rubriked?

Current features?
  • 6 exciting courses ranging in difficulty
  • Up to 6 player multiplayer matches!
  • Automatic matchmaking at the press of a button!
  • Interesting and bright graphics!
  • Tight and precise platforming!
How do I play?

To get into a match, select "Quick match", afterwards wait until you either join a match, or automatically start your own match (this happens when no matches are available)

Use the arrow keys and the space bar to jump through the levels

Latest update!

Reworked the matchmaking to use google firebase instead of MQTT, this makes the matchmaking a lot more fast and secure!
